review: Simply put - Awesome.  After trying Apple TV and Roku, I thought there was only a small place in my home for these set-top boxes.  After outfitting one TV with Fire TV for a few months, I decided that I wanted them on all of my TVs.  Now I have gotten rid of cable completely and I doubt I would ever find a need for it again. The  Plex app adds tremendous value to top it off.
author: Rory Biel
